snippet.title: PS4 | 「GINTAMA PROJECT LAST GAME」 Teaser PV (EN)
snippet.description:
「GINTAMA PROJECT LAST GAME」 will be available in Japanese voiceover and English subtitles for Southeast Asia (Singapore, Malaysia, Thailand, Philippines and Indonesia)! The game will be available for the PlayStation®4 platform on both physical and digital version.

Vote for your Gintama bonus DLC! Voting Site: http://bit.ly/GintamaVote
Sakata Gintoki, Shimura Shinpachi, Kagura and other characters will be coming back in Gintama Project Last Game! To commemorate the announcement of the game, we’re putting the decision in your hands! Vote for your favourite character, the most popular artwork will be created into a downloadable content. 

*Final bonus DLC item will be decided upon end of vote, dependent on results.

*The exact title of the game is to be confirmed, and the current name will be used as reference to this project.
